title: [Large-Scale] Instructional Expertise Development Workshop for Designing Online and Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with digital tools and foundational online education management skills
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented design competency enhancement program for professionals needing to adapt to post-pandemic educational paradigm shifts.

learning_goals: Participants can create blended learning activity design documents using team-based collaboration tools.
Participants can evaluate their instructional design and derive improvement strategies through reflective journaling.
Participants will be able to develop three experiential learning scenarios implementable in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.
Participants will be able to design and present online-offline integrated assessment tools suitable for project-based evaluation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
